text: Komagata Shrine is a shrine situated in Iwate Prefecture. It has a head office in Mizusawa Nakaueno-cho, Oshu City, and an inner shrine located at the summit of Mt. Shikinaisha. It is a beppyo shrine under the Association of Shinto Shrines. It is the ichinomiya of RikuchÅ« Province Category:Ichinomiya Category:Beppyo shrines Category:Iwate Prefecture
title: Komagata Shrine
